market_research_risks.insufficient_market_data: Implement multiple data sources and validation methods
market_research_risks.competitive_analysis_incomplete: Use multiple analysis frameworks and expert review

business_operations_risks.operations_framework_complexity: Start with simple framework and iterate
business_operations_risks.legal_compliance_issues: Engage legal experts and review all requirements
business_operations_risks.performance_monitoring_overhead: Implement lightweight monitoring and scale up

financial_compliance_risks.financial_model_accuracy: Use multiple modeling approaches and validation
financial_compliance_risks.compliance_requirements_changes: Monitor regulatory changes and update framework
financial_compliance_risks.risk_management_inadequacy: Implement comprehensive risk assessment and monitoring
